nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Welcome to **GN_VN**, the Visual Novel Engine for Godot!

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: Hello! I'm Alice, your guide through this demo.

options.text: I want to see the technical stuff

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: Aww, thank you! I'm excited to show you what GN_VN can do.

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: GN_VN includes many features like **rich text formatting**, *italic text*, and {color=red}colored text{/color}!

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: We also support [ruby=漢字]kanji[/ruby] with furigana readings!

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: GN_VN is built entirely in GDScript and integrates seamlessly with Godot's node system.

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: You can use variables like $player_name in your stories!

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: The condition was true! GN_VN supports conditional branching.

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: The condition was false! This demonstrates conditional logic.

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: GN_VN features deterministic saves using JSON format - no more pickle files!

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: You can also rollback through the story with frame-accurate precision.

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: Localization is built-in with CSV/JSON import/export support.

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: I'm glad you think so! GN_VN is designed to be both powerful and easy to use.

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: Check out the README.md file for detailed documentation and examples!

nodes.speaker: Alice
nodes.text: Perfect! Start by creating a new StoryResource and adding nodes to it.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Thank you for trying GN_VN! This demo showcases the core features of the engine.
